quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: I’ve been raising the same safeguarding issues for months and nothing’s changed.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I know, and I’ve kept raising them too, but they don’t act on it.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Then what’s the point of raising it if no one acts?

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: The point is it creates a record that the issues were highlighted.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: A record doesn’t protect me from harm right now.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I agree, it doesn’t keep you safe immediately, but it matters for oversight later.

contradictions.issue: Victim highlights repeated safeguarding issues ignored; advocate insists record matters later, ignoring immediate safety
